body: A lighter version of o-yoroi armor, a tatami-do arm armor piece is composed of a lighter lamellar shoulder guard and a lacquered sleeve. A set of tatami-do arm armor pieces includes a pair of gauntlets.
name: Tatami-Do Arm Armor Piece
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Tatami-Do Arm Armor Piece
